review: Anything that can be shown on an internet browser, including stuff on your own computer like photos and documents, is replicated on your TV where it looks better.  Your TV has to have an HDMI port, and the Chromecast also has to be connected either to a power outlet or a USB port.  Adapters are included.  I didn't try the USB because it set up on our password-protected WI-FI easily.
